snippet: Consumers can submit photographs of girls ages 2 to 7 through June 22, after which a panel of judges will pick 10 contest finalists; through Facebook, a winner will be named.
abstract: Consumers can submit photographs of girls ages 2 to 7 through June 22, after which a panel of judges will pick 10 contest finalists; through Facebook, a winner will be named.

headline.main: Contest Will Pick a 'Little Miss Coppertone'
